author: Epic Games
description:
Build the Legacy of The Batman...The LEGO Batman! 🦇
Learn More: https://epic.gm/lego-batman-lotdk
 
LEGO Batman: Legacy of the Dark Knight is a brand-new open world action adventure videogame that invites players to embark on Bruce Wayne’s epic journey to become the hero of Gotham City, inspired by decades of Batman films, television, comic books, and games, and jam-packed with Batman nostalgia, DC lore, and TT Games’ signature brand of fun-filled LEGO humor.
title: LEGO Batman: Legacy of the Dark Knight | Official Reveal Trailer

author: Epic Games
description: v8.4 "For the Stars Shall Defy Fate" is now available! Coralie's new S-rank battlesuit "Behold! Fate-Defying Dragon" and login events await! https://epic.gm/-honkai-impact-3rd
title: Honkai Impact 3rd | v8.4 For the Stars Shall Defy Fate

author: Epic Games
description:
The war for Europe is in your hands! Take command in a dieselpunk tactical roguelite where mechs dominate the battlefield, your team evolves with every mission, and the Axis war machine must be crushed once and for all. Upgrade your squad, outthink the enemy, and liberate Europe! 

Play Grit And Valor - 1949: https://epic.gm/grit-and-valor1949
title: Grit and Valor – 1949 | Launch Trailer

author: Epic Games
description:
Gear Up. Tether up. Throw Down. 
 
Check out the new Gameplay Trailer for Out of Time - the ultimate co-op roguelike!
 
Embrace the Chaos.
 
Pre-Purchase Today! https://epic.gm/out-of-time
title: Out of Time | Official Gameplay Trailer

author: Epic Games
description:
A brand new update has just been released for 33 Immortals! Ready to face The Wrath of God? Jump in now! https://epic.gm/33-immortals

Update 3 is now live and includes:
- Unique Elite enemies that are larger and stronger!
- Legendary weapon skins that drop when you defeat major bosses like Lucifer or Adam & Eve.
- Daily events!
- And much more.
The rebellion continues, and so do the improvements!
title: 33 Immortals | Update 3
